title: How to Make Pear Vodka

steps.headline: Cut each pear into 4 wedges and remove the core using a paring knife.
Sterilize a large airtight glass jar by washing the jar in the dishwasher or filling the jar with boiling water.
Place the pears in the jar.
Pour the vodka over the pears and seal the jar.
Place the jar in a cool, dry place for at least 2 weeks.
Pour the vodka from the infusion jar into clean bottles or jars.
steps.description: Make sure to use a cheesecloth as a strainer. Discard the pears in either your garbage bin or compost pile or eat them immediately. If you try to store them, then they will turn brown.

steps.headline: Seal the bottles or jars and store them in your refrigerator until you are ready to use them.

text: Cut each pear into 4 wedges and remove the core using a paring knife.  Sterilize a large airtight glass jar by washing the jar in the dishwasher or filling the jar with boiling water.  Place the pears in the jar.  Pour the vodka over the pears and seal the jar.  Place the jar in a cool, dry place for at least 2 weeks.  Pour the vodka from the infusion jar into clean bottles or jars. Make sure to use a cheesecloth as a strainer. Discard the pears in either your garbage bin or compost pile or eat them immediately. If you try to store them, then they will turn brown. Seal the bottles or jars and store them in your refrigerator until you are ready to use them.
sentences: Cut each pear into 4 wedges and remove the core using a paring knife.
Sterilize a large airtight glass jar by washing the jar in the dishwasher or filling the jar with boiling water.
Place the pears in the jar.
Pour the vodka over the pears and seal the jar.
Place the jar in a cool, dry place for at least 2 weeks.
Pour the vodka from the infusion jar into clean bottles or jars.
Make sure to use a cheesecloth as a strainer.
Discard the pears in either your garbage bin or compost pile or eat them immediately.
If you try to store them, then they will turn brown.
Seal the bottles or jars and store them in your refrigerator until you are ready to use them.
tyn_section: Large jar with an airtight lid
Jars or bottles for storing the infused vodka
